title: Trilogy Sanctuary
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Cafe, holistic health center, and event venue. Menu is organic vegan and has gluten-free, soy-free, refined sugar-free options. Serves fresh pressed juices plus smoothies, desserts, extensive list of entrees and salads. Its rooftop terrace offers views over La Jolla and out to the ocean. The restaurant is located on the 4th floor of the building, enter next to Pharmaca and follow the signs.
